TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InkCanvasClipboardFormat extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the formats that an will accept from the Clipboard.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.PreferredPasteFormats%2A> to make the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> accept [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)].
[!code-cs[InkCanvasSamples#26](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/InkCanvasSamples/Window1.xaml.cs#26)] [!code-vb[InkCanvasSamples#26](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/InkCanvasSamples/Window1.xaml.vb#26)]
